    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    A3DScope
    This class implements FFmpeg's "a3dscope" multimedia filter.
    ABuffer
    This class implements FFmpeg's "abuffer" filter.
    ABufferSink
    This class implements FFmpeg's "abuffersink" filter.
    ACompressor
    Wrapper class for the acompressor FFmpeg filter.
    AContrast
    Simple audio dynamic range compression/expansion filter.
    ACrossFade
    This class implements the "acrossfade" audio filter.
    ADecorrelate
    Apply decorrelation to input audio stream.
    ADelay
    This class implements the "adelay" FFmpeg filter.
    ADenorm
    This class implements the FFmpeg "adenorm" filter.
    ADrc
    This class implements FFmpeg's "adrc" filter.
    ADynamicEqualizer
    This class implements FFmpeg's "adynamicequalizer" filter.
    ADynamicSmooth
    Apply dynamic smoothing to input audio stream.
    AFormat
    This class acts as a wrapper around the "aformat" FFmpeg filter.
    AFreqShift
    Apply frequency shift to input audio samples.
    ANullSink
    This class implements the "anullsink" audio filter.
    ASplit
    This class implements the "asplit" audio filter.
    ATempo
    Implements the "atempo" audio filter.
    Audio
    This class generates the audio files.
    AudioConversionException
    This class represents an exception that will be thrown should the text-to-audio conversion not succeed.
    AudioFilter
    This is just a dummy class to identify audio filters from video ones.
    AudioFilterGraph
    This class is used to instantiate a new simple filter graph for the audio track.
    AudioFiltering
    This class makes audio filtering possible when only an audio track is processed.
    AudioSimpleFilterChain
    This class implements a new simple filter chain for the audio filters.
    Bicubic
    This class represents the Bicubic scaling algorithm.
    BoxBorderW
    This class implements the "boxborderw" option of the "drawtext" video filter.
    Buffer
    This class implements FFmpeg's "buffer" filter.
    BufferSink
    This class implements the "buffersink" video filter.
    ChannelLayout
    This class implements FFmpeg's channel layouts.
    ColorCorrect
    This class implements the "colorcorrect" video filter.
    ColorMatrix
    This class represents a color matrix to be used in the scaling filter.
    Concat
    This class implements the "concat" multimedia filter.
    Curve
    This class implements curve types used in the "acrossfade" and "afade" audio filters.
    Description
    This class is used as a structure for the creation of an audio file.
    DrawText
    This class implements the "drawtext" filter.
    ExecutorResHandler
    This class handles the execution of a callback to be executed at the termination of any picture's inference.
    ExecutorResHandler
    This class handles the result of the command used to check either that the aspect ratio of each frame is compatible with the given pixel format or that the given codec is supported by the current installation of FFmpeg.
    FFMpeg
    Convenience class to execute ffmpeg commands.
    FFMpegBuilder
    Builder class for convenience class FFMpeg
    File
    This class extends java.io.File to provide further functionality.
    Filter
    This class is the abstract representation of a filter to be added to a filter chain.
    FilterChain
    This class handles the implementation of the filter chain.
    FilterGraph
    This class implements a filter graph.
    Format
    This class implements the "format" video filter.
    FPSMode
    This class implements FFmpeg's "-fps_mode" option.
    GeneralException
    Wrapper class to implement exceptions in this library.
    Geq
    This class sets the parameters for ffmpeg's "geq" filter.
    InvalidArgumentException
    This class represents an exception which is risen when an invalid argument is given to a method or constructor.
    InvalidJSONFileException
    This exception provides a way to tell the user that the given JSON file is not valid.
    JsonParser
    Wrapper class for Google's JSON parser.
    JSONToImage
    This class translates a given JSON file into a list of Image objects.
    NullSink
    This class implements the "nullsink" video filter.
    PermissionsException
    This class provides an exception to tell the user that he or she does not have enough permissions to act on a specific location inside the file system.
    ProcessController
    This class acts as a wrapper to control and execute the video creation processes.
    ProcessPool
    This class is used to create a thread pool which will be used to execute a specified number of threads.
    RotationFailedException
    This class implements an exception being thrown when the rotation fails for some reason.
    RotationTransition
    This class performs the rotation.
    Scale
    This class implements the "scale" video filter.
    ScalingAlgorithm
    This class represents a general scaling algorithm.
    ScalingParams
    This class implements the parameters of the scaling filter.
    Size
    This class is a utility class that can be used to check if the given size ID is allowed by FFmpeg.
    Split
    This class implements the "split" video filter.
    StringExt
    This class provides some utility functions that can be used to extend the functionalities provided by the class String.
    TimeCode
    This class implements the "timecode" option of the "drawtext" filter.
    TracksMerger
    A class that helps merge audio and video tracks.
    UnsupportedOperatingSystemException
    This exception is thrown when the operating system on which the user is operating is not supported.
    UnsupportedOperationException
    This class extends UnsupportedOperationException to minimise the lines of code to br written to throw it.
    VideoCreator
    This class is used to create videos using different options compatible with ffmpeg.
    VideoFilter
    This class is used as a dummy class to identify video filters from audio ones.
    VideoFilterGraph
    This class is used to instantiate a new simple filter graph for the video track.
    VideoSimpleFilterChain
    This class is used to distinguish video simple filter chains from audio ones.
    VideoTranscoder
    This class performs the video transcoding operations.
